front.title: Multisession BGP extensions without new TCP ports

abstract.t: This document proposes minor backward-compatible changes to BGP forenabling multiple sessions to be established between pair of BGPspeakers for different AFI/SAFI or groups of thereof. It alsodescribes mechanism for handling each session in separate process(for information only). This memo updates BGP and multiprotocolextensions for BGP-4 specifications .
